description: PMO, onboarding, experimentation, and FinOps components

PMODashboard.description: Main PMO dashboard with portfolio overview and key metrics.

StatusReport.description: Executive status report with RAG indicators and key metrics.

MilestoneTracker.description: Visual timeline of project milestones with status indicators.

MilestoneItem.description: A single milestone with date, status, and description.

GanttChart.description: Gantt chart view of project timeline.

GanttTask.description: A task in the Gantt chart.

RiskMatrix.description: Risk matrix showing risks by likelihood and impact.

RiskItem.description: A single risk with likelihood, impact, and mitigation.

IssueTracker.description: Issue tracking panel for project issues.

DecisionItem.description: A decision requiring approval or already made.

BurndownChart.description: Sprint or release burndown showing work remaining over time.

TeamMember.description: A team member with allocation details.

ChangeRequest.description: A scope or requirement change request.

DependencyItem.description: A single dependency between projects or tasks.

StakeholderView.description: Stakeholder-specific view adapting detail level to audience.

LessonLearned.description: A lesson learned or retrospective insight.

OnboardDashboard.description: Central onboarding dashboard with navigation, progress, and quick access.

OnboardNav.description: Onboarding navigation with phases and sections.

OnboardProgressBar.description: Progress bar showing overall onboarding status.

ProgressOverview.description: Detailed progress overview with phase breakdown.

PhaseProgressList.description: List of onboarding phases with progress.

PhaseProgress.description: Progress for a single onboarding phase.

ActivityItem.description: A single activity in the timeline.

LearningPathDetails.description: Detailed view of a learning path.

ModuleList.description: List of learning modules in a path.

ModuleDetails.description: Detailed view of a learning module.

ConceptList.description: List of key concepts to understand.

ConceptCard.description: A key concept the developer should understand.

TaskDetails.description: Detailed view of a guided task.

HintList.description: List of hints for a task.

ExperimentDashboard.description: Central experimentation dashboard with navigation, overview, and activity.

ExperimentNav.description: Experimentation navigation with sections and filters.

ExperimentOverview.description: Overview of experiments with filtering and management.

ExperimentList.description: List of experiments with status and metrics.

ExperimentCard.description: Experiment summary card with key metrics.

ExperimentTimeline.description: Timeline of experiment events and changes.

TimelineEvent.description: A single event in the experiment timeline.

VariantCard.description: Variant summary with allocation and metrics.

MetricComparisonChart.description: Chart comparing metric values across variants.

TimeSeriesChart.description: Time series chart of experiment metrics.

ConfidenceChart.description: Chart showing confidence level over time.

SegmentBreakdown.description: Results broken down by user segment.

FlagDetails.description: Detailed view of a feature flag.

TargetingRule.description: A targeting rule for feature flags or experiments.

AudienceDetails.description: Detailed view of an audience segment.

AudienceUsage.description: Shows where an audience is used.

FinOpsDashboard.description: Central FinOps dashboard with navigation, cost overview, and content areas.

CostSummaryBar.description: Cost summary bar with key metrics.

CostOverview.description: Overview of cloud costs with breakdown by service or team.

CostToolbar.description: Toolbar for cost filtering and view controls.

CostBreakdown.description: Cost breakdown by category (service, team, environment).

CostComparison.description: Side-by-side cost comparison across periods or segments.

BudgetPanel.description: Panel showing budgets and their status.

BudgetToolbar.description: Toolbar for budget filtering and actions.

BudgetStatus.description: Budget status showing spend vs allocation.

BudgetDetails.description: Detailed budget view with history and alerts.

BudgetSpendChart.description: Chart showing budget vs actual spend over time.

SavingsSummary.description: Summary of potential and realized savings.

OptimizationRecommendation.description: Cost optimization recommendation with potential savings.

OptimizationDetails.description: Detailed optimization view with implementation steps.

SavingsTracker.description: Tracker showing realized savings from optimizations.

ResourceExplorer.description: Explorer for drilling into resource-level costs.

FinopsResourceToolbar.description: Toolbar for resource filtering and search.

FinopsResourceList.description: List of resources with cost information.

ResourceCost.description: Cost breakdown for a specific resource.

ResourceDetails.description: Detailed resource view with cost history.

CostAllocation.description: Cost allocation table showing costs by tag or dimension.

AllocationRow.description: A row in cost allocation table.

AnomalyAlert.description: Cost anomaly alert showing unexpected spend.

pmo-show-pmo-dashboard.description: Show main PMO dashboard with portfolio overview

pmo-show-project-status.description: Show executive status report for project

pmo-show-raid-log.description: Show RAID log (Risks, Actions, Issues, Decisions)

pmo-show-budget.description: Show budget tracking and financial status

pmo-show-lessons-learned.description: Show lessons learned and retrospective insights

finops-show-cost-overview.description: Show cloud cost overview and trends
